title: Old Spanish Typeface
content:
I realize this is hand drawn, but I'm wondering if there are any similar typefaces?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Old-Spanish-doc\_2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140117123908/http:/typophile.com/files/Old-Spanish-doc_2.jpg) | 107.35 KB |
author: Mario

comments.content: The typeface that would be closest, although without the swashes, would be Civilité. There are several versions from different vendors, some of which may contain a few swash characters, so look at them all before deciding.
